title: APlusLift HW-9KFL 9,000LB 2-Post Floor Plate Car Lift (Free Shipping to Business with Forklift)
body_html:
All 2-Post Car Lifts

  • 36 Months Parts Warranty

  • 6'9" Lift Height Maximum with Truck Adapters

  • All Robot Welded Structure with Durable Powder Coated Finish

  • Double Seal Rings Protecting PU Material

  • Upgraded Floor Plate, Beveled Diamond Plate Steel 5/32" with Supporting Bracket.

APlusLift HW-9KFL car lift (auto hoist) is one of the most affordable floor plate car lift with 9,000 LB Heavy Duty.

APlusLift HW-9KFL car lifts are built with quality materials and good workmanship. We do not use recycled materials to save cost for parts such as cylinder seal rings. Suggestions to improve our products and service are always welcome!

Free shipping to lower 48 states with forklift (or similar) on-site, or free pickup at nearby terminal. Car lifts require on-site forklift (no liftgate). We strongly recommend against renting a forklift; expense not reimbursed. See shipping policy below for limited access/remote/high-cost areas.

Warehouse Pickup Locations (Contact Us for $200 Discount): Portland (OR), Dallas (TX), Jacksonville (FL), Mobile (AL) and Mansfield (OH).

Frequently Asked Product, Order, and Shipping Questions and Technical Questions

Specifications and Features

  • Installation Manual
  • Symmetrical Arm Assembly:
  • Straight Front / Rear 2 Stage reach from 30 1/8" to 45 3/8"
  • Equal length of front and rear arm design
  • Drop-in type lifting pads and truck adapters included
  • Double point safety lock release
  • Automatic arm lock restraints
  • Relief valve built in power pump to prevent overloading
  • Door guards protection rubber
  • Up-limit switch to protect cylinders working stroke used in safe length scope
  • Heavy duty 3/10" diameter cable and 4 1/5" pulley that reduce high stress on synchronization process and increase cable life
  • Upgraded Floor Plate, Beveled Diamond Plate Steel 5/32" with Supporting Bracket.
  • Stiffened base plate 5/8" thickness
  • Ultra high molecular self lubricating nylon slider that ensures carriage smooth moving up and down
  • Lifting operation by pressing "UP" button on motor
  • Manual lowering operation by pressing lever
  • 2 sets of truck adapters (height extensions) included
  • Lifting Capacity: 9,000 LB
  • Overall Height: 113 5/8"
  • Overall Width: 134 3/16"
  • Lifting Height without Truck Adapters: 75"
  • Lifting Height with Truck Adapters: 81"
  • Minimum Height of Arm Top: 4"
  • Carriage to Carriage Width (Drive-through clearance): 100"
  • Column to Column Width: 109"
  • Column Cross Section: 11"L x 7"W
  • Floor Plate Size: 10 5/8"W x 1 7/8"H
  • Driving Mode: Dual hydraulic cylinders, chain drive
  • Motor: 220V Single Phase 3HP 10A (recommend a 30A breaker)
  • Hydraulic Oil: 3-5 gallons AW32/AW46 (Not Included in the Package)
  • Time to full rise: 50 seconds
  • Concrete Requirement: 4" at 3500psi reinforced with fiberglass or steel
  • Anchor bolts/mounting hardware included
  • Shipping Weight: 1,200 LB
  • Shipping package size: 113"L x 22"W x 40"H

All 2-Post Car Lifts
